<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Mauler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=68)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 183 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

You shove your way through legions of foes, knock enemies on all sides to the ground, and deal massive blows to anyone or anything that comes near.

<title level="3">Additional Feats</title>

This archetype has some feats at a level other than their original level.
Such feats are marked with a \*.

[Click here for the full rules on Additional Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1432).
